entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangiqsujuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 32. Wind chill near minus 51. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
